subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: I learned the great lesson of what happens when an Average Joe runs through a basketball workout designed for a likely No. 1 pick in the N.B.A. draft — fatigue makes the mind slow.
